---
title: "oci_invalid_unexpected_scheme.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file represents an invalid configuration for OCI (Open Container Initiative) storage in a system. It demonstrates an example of an incorrect configuration where an unexpected scheme is used in the repository URL.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The `storage` section defines the configuration for the storage system.

#### Internal Logic
- Specifies the storage type as "oci" (Open Container Initiative)
- Contains nested configuration for OCI-specific settings

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage to be used.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The type of storage |

#### Outputs
The value "oci" is set for this field.

### `storage.oci`
#### Description
Contains the configuration specific to OCI storage.

#### Internal Logic
- Defines the repository URL
- Specifies authentication details

### `storage.oci.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the URL of the OCI repository.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The URL of the OCI repository |

#### Outputs
The value "unknown://registry/repo:tag" is set for this field.

#### Internal Logic
This field demonstrates an invalid configuration by using an unexpected scheme ("unknown://") in the repository URL.

### `storage.oci.authentication`
#### Description
Defines the authentication credentials for accessing the OCI repository.

#### Internal Logic
- Specifies a username and password for authentication

### `storage.oci.authentication.username`
#### Description
The username for authenticating with the OCI repository.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| username | string | The username for authentication |

#### Outputs
The value "foo" is set for this field.

### `storage.oci.authentication.password`
#### Description
The password for authenticating with the OCI repository.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| password | string | The password for authentication |

#### Outputs
The value "bar" is set for this field.

## Error Handling
This configuration file is intentionally invalid to demonstrate error handling in the system. The main error is in the `storage.oci.repository` field, which uses an unexpected scheme ("unknown://") instead of a valid OCI repository URL scheme.

## TODOs
While there are no explicit TODOs in the code, it's worth noting that this configuration is intentionally invalid and should not be used in a production environment. The repository URL should be corrected to use a valid scheme for OCI repositories.
